title: Interpretation of a dream about a water spring according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing a water spring in a dream indicates good things, an abundance of money, and other meanings. We will refer to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, and male, such as watering from a spring, or water coming out of a spring, or drinking water from hot springs, or water coming out of a rock for Ibn Sirin and others. 

**Subject: Interpretation of seeing a spring in a dream**

A water spring in a dream is a blessing, good, and a blessing, and the fulfillment of a wish if its owner hides it. Whoever sees water springs erupting in his house and is not afraid, a calamity will befall him. His household will cry. Whoever sees that he is making ablution from a water spring, this indicates that the dreamer will be healed, whether the water is clean or not, whether it is hot or cold, provided that it is pure, and it is permissible to make ablution with it for prayer because of the ablution.

Whoever sees in his house or in an inappropriate place that a water spring has erupted, this indicates that the dreamer will gain sustenance, good, and benefit, and if it descends in his house, this is sadness from women. And if it erupts from a wall, then it is worry that will befall him from a man in that house, such as a brother or a brother-in-law or a friend. And if it bursts and comes out of the house until everything is lost, he will escape from worry quickly. And if it does not come out, the worry will remain. And if it is pure, then it is concern for a healthy body. And he hates from the eye of whoever erupts his water and his water does not flow.

And whoever sees a water spring flowing for him in a limited channel, whether he is alive or dead, then the interpretation of this is good in his religion and his work, and this good will continue until the Day of Judgment. Whoever sees a water spring erupting in a place or a house, overflowing or not overflowing, then it is sadness and crying. And if the water is overflowing from the spring, then it is more serious and stronger. And they said: Whoever sees that it has erupted in his house or in a place of water, he will buy a servant. And if he sees eyes that have erupted from the earth, then the people of the place will have an abundance of money. fruits.

Water flowing from the valleys, if it is pure, is a sign of goodness for all people, especially for the sick and the poor, as it appears that it is easy and innocent because it is not more delicious than water. Whoever washes with the water of the spring, if he is upset, God will relieve him, or he is afraid or sick, or he will be healed, or he has a debt, or he will pay off his debt, or he has sins, God will atone for them. him. Whoever sees a clear spring, his wealth will increase, and if he sees it flowing in houses, then it is a happy life for the people in general.

**Ibn Sirin's Interpretation of Water Springs in a Dream**

The dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, states that springs represent in the world of dreams some crucial aspects of your destiny or indicate that you are facing some life-changing situations in the future.

Dreaming of springs or eyes made of water indicates concerns about your future. This vision also indicates that you must make important decisions about your future. The water spring that then develops and becomes like a river symbolizes the inner strength that the dreamer possesses to achieve his goal.

On the other hand, a clear water spring indicates purity and hope, while a dirty water spring indicates the lack of clarity of your goal.

Generally, when you see a source of water like a water spring in your dream, this dream symbolizes enthusiasm. This vision shows that you are the person who cares greatly about true values and tries to live a righteous life.

Sometimes a water spring appears in a dream that the fortune-teller, when making his important decisions, relies heavily on the desire not to hurt anyone because you prefer to suffer injustice than to apply it to someone. When you see a mysterious water spring whose owner you do not know, this dream indicates that there is a possibility of failure because you cannot achieve everything you want, making you feel weak and you may continue to feel sorry for yourself. You did nothing to change the situation that makes you unhappy. When you drink from a well of water, this dream indicates that you are taking risks with your chances and you may get a job you have always dreamed of and you will realize that these chances are rare in your life and you will do everything to show yourself. The best possible performance.

The water spring in a dream means that the seer will give up some things that he enjoyed, but he will not regret sacrificing these things, because he will know that they will bear fruit soon.

When you see a dry water spring, this dream indicates that you will suffer a loss, and the loss may not be only material loss, but may also be related to your relationships or your work. You may feel that you have nothing else to do, or that you have spent a lot of energy on things that will not benefit you, so you will need a vacation and you may look for happiness elsewhere.

The water spring that suddenly disappears indicates that you are losing hope in life or that you want to give up and give up on your dreams, so this vision tells you that you need to look at life from a more positive perspective.

Springs or springs of abundant fluids represent the decisions you will make, and when you make a decision, it will affect your life in the future because you have made an important decision. Water springs in the middle of nature symbolize harmony, and this dream can also come if you are in a stressful stage and want to escape oppression and live more peacefully.

**Interpretation of the Spring in a Dream**

Seeing a spring in a dream is good news, as seeing a spring indicates that the dreamer will achieve great sustenance and goodness in his life in general, especially in his social life.

A spring in a dream means that the dreamer will meet again with people whose relationship with them was broken before, and this will make him very happy, and he will be able to achieve all his dreams and desires in a short time, and he will realize a quick recovery from any disease that he suffers from.

**Interpretation of Seeing a Water Source in a Dream**

The water source in the dream indicates that the owner of the vision will adhere to a friend who will greatly help him to change his work plan and help him to follow other ways to greatly increase his financial income.

**Interpretation of Drinking Water from a Spring in a Dream**

Seeing someone drinking from water springs in a dream indicates that the dreamer will achieve great success and a large livelihood, because of his diligence in his work in the past period, and he will live a happy and peaceful life with all the comforts, and they will not. exposure to any problem or disease.

**Interpretation of Bathing in a Water Spring in a Dream**

Seeing bathing from a water source in a dream means that the dreamer has overcome great problems and trials in his life, and after this period ends, he will live a happy life and enjoy all the happy moments with his family.

**Interpretation of Seeing a Clear Water Spring in a Dream**

Seeing a clear tearful spring in a dream represents the presence of a dear friend in the dreamer's life. This friend is willing to give up everything for the happiness of his friend and protect him even unto death.

Seeing yourself drinking from a clear water spring in a dream indicates a courageous, kind-hearted, and well-spoken person.

**Interpretation of Seeing a Muddy Water Spring in a Dream**

Seeing a spring with muddy water in your dream is not a good thing…

title: Interpretation of a dream about a loved one according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: If you see someone you love in your dream, this means entering into a serious relationship and other interpretations, we will explain them for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, such as seeing someone you love in a dream after separation, or seeing someone you love who is far from you, or that he loves to talk to you, or a dream of someone you love in talking to you or kissing you like the son of Galinia and others in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream Seeing the person you love in a dream means for unmarried people that they are living in a happy relationship, and for married people, seeing the person you love in a dream means that good news will come from them and their relationship will last for a long time.ZOE. If the person you saw was smiling in the dream, this indicates the arrival of good news, but if his face was gloomy, this indicates bad news. Seeing someone you love in a dream also means that you need the support of this person. Usually, seeing the person you love in a dream is a vision seen by singles and indicates that the person seeing the vision will enter the marital nest soon with someone they have been together for a long time and have suffered together happy days and hardships as well. Moreover, it shows that the seer will receive good news about someone he loves. Seeing the person you love in a dream means that you will live happily and the person will receive good news that will relieve him from his state of weakness. Whoever sees the person he loves means that there will be positive developments in his private life and thanks to bilateral dialogues his problems will be solved. For a married woman, it indicates a beautiful love life and they will see all the beauty of life through their relationship. Seeing the loved one in a dream means fulfilling the life that the person has longed for for years, wishes and will bear a child and make his parents happy and start a new stage in his life. The unmarried girl who sees the person she loves means that they will love at first sight, and they will meet someone they will not be able to get out of their minds. Also, this vision indicates the end of the person's suffocating and sad situations, and it also indicates that his wealth will laugh at him, and his split will open up, and the door of his desires will open. Seeing the person you love in a dream is one of the visions that represents the subconscious mind of people who dream of marrying someone they are related to and love, and think about him all the time during their day, and generally indicates the loved one who always comes to him the seer's mind and always makes his memories alive with him. Seeing the person you love in a dream indicates a good marriage, and for the poor, it means creating a marital nest based on experience. The person who sees the one he loves will be comfortable and will not worry about health problems in the future. Similarly, whoever sees the person he loves happy, his relationship turns into marriage, and if he is married, he will have children. It means for young people that they will meet someone who will make them happy with his presence and will support them throughout their lives and they will live without problems. As for work, it indicates that the visionary who received good news will receive the developments he expected and they will be more beautiful than he expected. Seeing the beloved for people in a relationship indicates that they will experience beautiful surprises, they will receive valuable gifts and feel good, and they will complete their relationship without problems, and their families will meet and take their first steps towards marriage. Seeing someone you love in a dream reflects a relationship that is going well, it indicates that there is someone who always thinks of the visionary during his day and loves him very much. It shows that the visionary needs to be loved, to see respect in society, to be taken care of by his environment and to be happy. Seeing someone you love in a dream There are many interpretations of dreams according to many things, events and actions that affect the person in life, which may be reflected in the form of dreams that his subconscious mind imagines. dream interpretation. We will try to clarify some clues that indicate seeing the loved one in a dream. If one dreamed that he wanted to understand the meaning of a certain thing, it means that he will be deceived by someone he loves and will discover the weakness of his honesty. If one dreamed that he signed a marriage contract, it means that he will hear bad news about absence. If someone dreamed that he was present at a joy, this indicates that he will be happy because there is someone who will take care of him and will also develop in his work. If one dreamed of a bad accident happening at a joy, this indicates a catastrophe in the family circle that could lead to death. If one dreamed of seeing the coffin, this indicates bad circumstances, death and sadness. If one dreamed of carrying a coffin, this indicates the possibility of the death of a family member. If one dreamed of having a friend die in turmoil and anxiety, it means that bad luck will accompany him in all circumstances. If one dreams of lemons on trees, this indicates envy directed towards someone he loves. If one dreamed that he was choking himself, it means that he was shocked by the bad morals of someone he loves. If one dreams of withered roses, it means that there is no one he loves. If one dreamed of white roses without dew on them or even sunlight, it means that he will suffer from a serious disease that will lead to his death. If one dreamed of smelling the scent of roses, it means that he will live in love, happiness and pleasure. If one dreamed of seeing the gallows, this indicates his deep sadness for not being able to keep someone he loves. Interpretation of seeing someone I loved in a dream When you dream of someone you love, not necessarily at night, it is natural to dream of someone who controls your thoughts even during the day. These are the most common interpretations of dreaming of someone you love. Usually, people dream of people close to them, such as their parents, relatives, friends, or your partner. - When you dream of someone you love, it indicates that you are very attached to him. To dream of someone you love means that you have feelings towards this person. - These feelings do not have to be feelings to create an intimate relationship with him, but it is a unique feeling inside you and that you have a relationship with this person. Dreaming of someone shows that you admire him. Generally, dreaming of someone you love can have a positive or negative side, depending on the true interpretation of the dream Interpretation of kissing someone I loved in a dream Seeing your lover kissing in a dream represents victory over enemies and the downfall of plans that they have prepared for you. At the same time, the vision is one of the visions that warns the person to pay attention to his enemies. Seeing a married person exchanging kisses with the one he loves in general means that news has reached the family about the arrival of a new child. It also indicates that the person in the vision is going through difficult times and expects more attention from the dreamer. By his lover on the lips expresses the material level and indicates that the person will enter ...

title: Interpretation of Theft in a Dream According to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

Stealing in a dream for a single woman, Stealing is one of the shameful acts that Allah Almighty punishes and the law punishes, so seeing it in a dream causes anxiety and disturbance and makes the dreamer have a desire to search for the interpretation and know what was mentioned by jurists and experts in the law. The science of interpreting sayings related to seeing theft in a dream, especially if the fortune-teller is a single girl, and does the interpretation differ whether she is a thief or stolen? We will explain this in the following lines, so follow us.

Stealing in a dream for a single woman

Despite the disturbing and shameful appearance of the vision, some interpreters mentioned many and diverse aspects of it that convey good news to the viewer and wish him a happy and stable life. in changing her life for the better and achieving some of her goals and ambitions.

If the girl really wants to achieve a certain desire, but many obstacles and difficulties in her life prevented her, then her vision of theft is considered a good omen for achieving what she wants by the command of God, but if the vision was stolen. Expensive things after resistance on her part, but she failed to keep them, then it was a warning to her that there is someone in reality who is trying to push her to commit immorality and forbidden things, so she should watch herself and stick to the religious and moral foundations she was raised on.

Stealing in a dream for Ibn Sirin

The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted theft in the dream of a single woman with many indicators that vary according to the events she narrates and what she is going through in reality. He found that stealing in general falls under sins and transgressions, so seeing it in a dream is an indication that the girl who dreams is exposed to some problems and disturbances in her life, but on the other hand, the vision can be promising for the dreamer in the event that one of her family members suffers from a health crisis, as the dream indicates her imminent recovery and enjoyment of health and well-being, by God's will.

If the dreamer sees herself stealing the Holy Quran, then this expresses what is happening in her subconscious mind and the suppressed feeling inside her of her negligence in performing her religious duties and fear of the anger of God Almighty and her reckoning for her distraction. in worldly matters and her forgetting of religion, so she should complete what is missing from her, and perform her duties fully.

Stealing money in a dream for a single woman

Stealing money in the dream of a single woman indicates that she is exposed to a period of worries and burdens, due to an increase in her responsibilities and her inability to carry them out, so she is sad and wronged and wants help. from those close to her, but if she can recover this money easily without getting into battles with the thief, then this was proof of her wisdom and rationality, and therefore she will be able to face these crises on her own very soon, by the command of God.

If the girl sees that she has a lot of torn money that was stolen in her dream, then this is good news for good circumstances and her release from the hardships and difficulties that control her life and prevented her from enjoying it. The girl's exposure to theft is a message to her to return to God Almighty and rely on Him in all matters of her life so that He will grant her blessings and success and guide her on the right path, so the road in front of her becomes paved. for success and achieving desires.

Stealing in a dream is a good omen for a single woman

Experts explained that dreaming of theft can be a good sign for a single girl and good news for her in many aspects of her life. His absence, and this will have a positive impact on her life, and the fact that she is imprisoned by her own free will, without resistance, proves her imminent marriage to the young man she wants as a life partner.

The dreamer's ability to recover stolen items is an indication that she bears more burdens and responsibilities without complaint or escape, which makes her a responsible and ambitious person who always tries to achieve what she wants, no matter how difficult the challenges she faces, she does not. She resorts to weakness or surrender, and the dream is also a good omen for the future, her escape from the narrowness or crisis that she was about to fall into, and God knows best.

I steal in the dream of a single woman

Seeing a girl in a dream stealing is an indication of her extravagance and spending a lot of money on things that are not useful, which may expose her to a major financial crisis and increase her debts and burdens. The vision also proves the girl's lack of experience and wisdom in dealing with the situations she is going through, as she always makes her decisions with recklessness and impulsiveness, and this leads to the loss of expensive things and the loss of good opportunities that are difficult to compensate for, so she must think carefully and manage the problem before making a decision.

Also, her stealing in the dream without feeling fear or anxiety confirms that this girl is characterized by hated characteristics and corruption in her morals; because she is permitted to what God Almighty has forbidden and does not adhere to the rights of others, and therefore she is bad. Her reputation among people and everyone shuns her, so she should return to her senses and get closer to God Almighty and repent to Him before it is too late.

Interpretation of a dream about stealing clothes for single women

Seeing stealing clothes in the dream of an individual symbolizes losses and losses, so if she is engaged, she may face a lot of arguments and battles with her fiancé in the current period, and if she does not have wisdom and patience, then the size Problems between them will worsen and often lead to the end of the relationship, as the dream leads to the availability of golden opportunities in the girl's life, which will create a bright future for her, but unfortunately she does not benefit from it. properly and neglects her own interest, and therefore failure will accompany her.

If she sees that there is a thief stealing her clothes, then she should realize that there is a person in her life who is trying to enter her privacy and learn her secrets to expose them to people, so she also realizes. extreme caution in her dealings with others and limiting her trust in them, as well as stealing clothes that she wears and her private exposed parts in a dream is an indication that she will face a serious crisis and ordeal that will be difficult to overcome, and God knows best.

Interpretation of a dream of stealing jewelry for single women

Stealing precious jewelry in the dream of a single girl is considered one of the undesirable visions, which indicates that she will face a period of anxiety and crises and may experience a great shock as a result of losing one of her family members. closeness to family or friends, but sometimes interpretations depend on some details, so if the thief is known to the fortune teller, then this indicates an exchange of benefits between them, but for the unknown thief...

title: Interpretation of a black cat dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text:
Seeing black cats in a dream indicates anxiety, illusions, and other interpretations that we will explain for single, married, pregnant, divorced, engaged, married, and single young men, for example... like a black cat chasing me or following me or entering the house or home, and Imam Al-Sadiq and others will continue the matter.

**Interpretation of a Black Cat in a Dream**
A black cat in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams you can have. It often indicates pessimism and anxiety. Dreaming of a black cat symbolizes the need to feel contentment and fulfillment.

Seeing a black cat in your dream may mean that you have a desire to feel contentment or comfort about something in your life that you find hard to let go of. 

A black cat in a dream also points to unbalanced fantasies, and it is generally very frightening. It can also indicate that you are out of touch with reality. And the black cat symbolizes, contrary to popular belief, that a black cat in a dream can be a sign of improvement in circumstances beyond material gains.

The black cat in a dream also symbolizes deep regret about some of the steps the dreamer will take in the future. The dream of a black cat warns against meeting a cunning and malicious person soon. 

As for seeing a black cat's tail in a dream, this indicates good luck on the level of emotional life. Seeing a black cat in a dream indicates the anxiety you will feel and shows your feeling of discomfort for a while. The dreamer needs to find a solution to get rid of the problems and fears they face. 

**Interpretation of Black Cats in a Dream by Ibn Sirin**
Seeing a black cat in a dream is evidence of bad and unpleasant news in the dreamer's life. Whoever sees a black cat is evidence of magic and sorcery in life. 

Seeing a black cat in a woman's dream is evidence of her being pregnant with an illegitimate child. And seeing a black cat in a dream in general is evidence of the existence of a malicious and hypocritical person in life.

Seeing a black cat by a wife indicates her husband's neglect of her and her children a lot. And the black cat in a married woman's dream is evidence of her husband's betrayal in the near future.

The black cat in a dream is evidence of the fear of life that controls the dreamer. Cats in a dream also indicate negative thoughts in the dreamer's head.

The black cat in a dream is evidence of your fear of losing someone close to you in the near future. Seeing a black cat in a dream is evidence of the abortion of a pregnant woman.

The cry of a black cat in a dream is evidence of hypocrisy and a false friend in life, while the gray cat in a dream is evidence of the betrayal of a close person.

Cats in a dream are evidence that someone has been betrayed. Being attacked by cats in a dream is evidence that there are some people trying to trap you. 

Seeing a cat without a night in a dream is evidence that you will lose your freedom soon.

Seeing black cats in a dream is evidence of gossip and bad talk against you, unlike a white cat in a dream, which is evidence of arrogance in life. 

The black cat in a dream is evidence of a hypocritical woman in your life, while seeing a white cat indicates that a cunning woman is trying to set you up.

**Interpretation of a Black Cat in a Dream by Al-Nabulsi**
The black cat in Islamic and Christian mythology in general is evidence of danger and a feeling of fear and anxiety, especially since the black color symbolizes sadness. Therefore, some considered it the color of death and epidemics, but this may not be closely related to the expression of vision, especially if it is a cat, as the cat usually expresses kindness, joy, and comfort, just as the black color can be expressed in more than one way, as it does not only mean sadness, but can symbolize subtle brilliance and beautiful, wonderful secrets, similar to Bilal ibn Rabah, may God be pleased with him, the muezzin of the Messenger of God, may God's prayers and peace be upon him. So the interpreter and translator should look for the most beautiful meanings and the most beloved expressions. which is to be achieved, God willing. Here is the most important thing said in the expression of seeing a black cat:

The cat differed in its interpretation. It is said that it is a guardian servant, and it is said that it is a thief from the house. It is said that the female is a deceitful, wicked, and abusive woman, and it is attributed to whoever goes around. About a man, he guards him, steals from him, steals from him, or harms him and benefits him. It is the disease of the year. If the cat is wild, it is more dangerous. If it is his cat, it is a year. Comfort and joy.

If the girl dreams that she is carrying a black cat or a small cat, then the betrayal of others will cause her to fall under the influence of an inappropriate act. If you dream of a white and clean cat, this indicates a difficult situation that may seem outwardly inappropriate. Dreaming of a white and clean cat indicates a predicament that may seem harmless but will prove to be a source of sorrow and loss of wealth. When the merchant dreams of a cat, he should use his best abilities for work, if his competitors succeed in destroying the level of his relationships, and if he sells at a lower price than the prices of others and persists, he will pressure the authority to take other measures.

The dream of the black color to be the black robe of the callers, or the Caliphs, or those who are accustomed to it: rest, then reward, and wearing white during the sermon is bad, and losing a place. Wearing black, for those who are not accustomed to it, means worries and sorrows. Therefore, the fortune teller who sees the black cat should not be afraid of such dreams and should be optimistic about them, for there may be good and justice in them.

**Interpretation of a Black Cat in a Dream by Imam Al-Sadiq**
The interpreter of dreams, Imam Ja'far Al-Sadiq, says that black cats in a dream may indicate evil spirits or envious eyes and may be from women.

Seeing a black cat in a dream indicates the book, because God Almighty said: {We have our cat before the Day of Resurrection}. Perhaps the black cat indicates separation from the wife and children, quarrels, theft, adultery, unfaithfulness, eavesdropping, hints, and obsessions. 

Perhaps the dream of black cats indicates the birth of a child of adultery or a newborn who does not know his father. The dream appears of one who speaks softly and is loved, jumping and dancing in people's hearts, yet he is looked at. And if he finds a suitable opportunity, he spoils others and harms them. 

It is said that the black cat in a dream was a servant or guardian, and it is said that it is a thief from the house, and it is said that the female is a deceitful wicked woman. 

The black cat bites him in a dream, or scratches her, and he becomes ill. And if the cat is wild, it is heavier. Whoever sees...

title: Interpretation of a dream about jam according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

Seeing jam in a dream refers to happiness and success, and other interpretations such as eating apricot jam, buying strawberry or orange jam, cooking grape jam, or making cherry jam.

Interpretation of jam in a dream

Seeing jam in a dream It indicates the success of the dreamer in being happy in his life and an indication of his effort to enjoy his life. Seeing jam also indicates that the person who saw jam in a dream will reach the place he wants without the help of anyone and without taking money from his family.
Seeing jam in a dream indicates that the dreamer works hard until he becomes a wealthy person, and the vision is an indication that he will get the profit of a project alone by the sweat of his brow.
The person who saw jam in his dream is a person who is qualified to be a role model for those around him because of his lifestyle, work, and great determination.
Eating a slice of bread with jam in a dream, although the dreamer is not rich, he is content with his livelihood, but he lives happier than many of the rich.
And the expression of the vision eating jam with bread in a dream that the fortune teller is a person who does not care about anything after he eats his daily bread, and does not pursue big dreams, and does not deviate from the course of his life.

Interpretation of eating jam in a dream

Seeing eating jam in a dream It indicates that the dreamer will have very beautiful developments in his life, and he will get what he wants with ease and will be very lucky. And it is interpreted that whoever saw eating jam in his dream will have a good share and we wish him success.
The person who saw that he was eating jam in a dream will get blessings and abundance will be realized in both the dreamer's profit and his livelihood, and he will also be surprised by this situation.

Interpretation of making jam in a dream

This means that the person who was seen making jam in a dream acts through calculating his future. And the interpreter that the dreamer is not the person who looks only at his work today, but on the contrary, he is a person who tries to do good things for tomorrow and leaves valuable things for his children or grandchildren, that is, for them after him?

Making jam in a dream indicates that the owner of the vision will find new ways to achieve financial gains thanks to his self-confidence and investment in his work, which started with a limited investment and expanded over time, in addition to being an indication of his obtaining an administrative position and regardless of his work. personal affirmation, he will be financially comfortable and spend moments of relaxation.
Like seeing building or preparing jam in a dream tells the dreamer that he will spend romantic moments full of love, especially for individuals or bachelors or bachelorettes, as it expresses that they will meet a sweet person and their hearts will flutter from the first moment. They meet and after a long romantic relationship they will get married.

And the vision of jam in a dream is interpreted as having a daughter, and buying a house with a small garden, getting everything that comes to mind and fulfilling aspirations, and the house of those who make jam will be full of guests and friends, and This vision is a sign that the family supports financially loyal friends.

Interpretation of cooking jam in a dream

Whoever saw in a dream that he was cooking jam, his life will not pass in one way, but he will sometimes experience sadness and tears, and sometimes joy and happiness. Cooking jam in a dream that the dreamer, like any human being, will feel all stages of life with its sadness and happiness.

Interpretation of making jam in a dream

The one who made jam in a dream It represents people who prefer to think positively at all moments of their lives, and if the expression is true, it indicates people who look at the glass half full, not empty.
Seeing preparing jam in a dream explains the constant daydreams of dreams related to the future, but it also explains the effort made to achieve these dreams and expresses emotional involvement in binary relationships and faith in solving all kinds of problems by talking and calm, not anger.

Interpretation of apricot jam in a dream

Seeing apricot jam in a dream It indicates the achievement of the expected success and the desired actions, and shows a future full of wealth, and he puts on a garment of joy as soon as possible.
Seeing making apricot jam in a dream represents the birth of healthy children, harmony and good understanding with the husband's family as well as his family, and an indication of the continuation of the blessing of money that the dreamer receives.

Interpretation of strawberry jam in a dream

Seeing strawberry jam in a dream It portends a beautiful life partner who will appear soon and indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his dreams and desires.
As for those who eat strawberry jam in a dream, it expresses that he will receive good news at the most appropriate time, live a life full of happiness and joy, succeed in his work, and do many good deeds until he reaches his country. dreams and everything beautiful that he has been waiting for for a long time.
At other times, seeing strawberry jam represents beautiful love and may also represent the dreamer's marriage to the person he loves.
And whoever eats jam in a dream gets a lot of money from his career and has beautiful results, and this vision is an indication of great profit, hearing good news, new love, marriage for singles, and harmony with someone . with good people and companions of good character.

Interpretation of eating strawberry jam in a dream

Dreaming of eating strawberry jam means that one will achieve something that he has been waiting for for a long time and will reach his goal, which will make him happy. And this vision is a sign of the money he enjoys and enjoys, and an indication of the increasing opportunities coming his way, and that luck will follow him every step he takes.
And for those who are thinking about getting married, this is an indication that he will meet a beautiful person close to his heart and will be part of his family, and he will start a beautiful beginning with him.
This dream also represents his beautiful and cheerful wife who understands everyone and treats them kindly, and receives good news about his academic life. It also tells about his celebration with his family for this happy news, and if the dreamer is sick, this vision is good news about the miracle of his health improvement, and after that he will not go through health crises, no matter what. his wishes will come to him beautifully.

Interpretation of cherry jam in a dream

To see cherry jam in a dream, if its smell is beautiful and nice, it expresses kindness and beauty, and expresses that the dreamer is a sincere, ethical and innocent person, and sometimes it expresses marriage and fate.
It may be a sign that all the dreamer's wishes and dreams will come true and that he will fall in love, but if the strawberries are rotten, it may be an expression of the destruction of his work and the emergence of big problems in his life. relationships.

Seeing a person picking cherries in a dream expresses the person's happiness with his marriage and his success in it, and it expresses the beautiful opportunities that will come his way to strengthen his relationship with his life partner and …
